ValidationRule.description: If Status is Resolution Plan please fill out Resolution Plan Date, Resolution cannot be blank if case Status is closed.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
IF($Profile.Name = "System Administrator", FALSE,
CONTAINS(RecordType.DeveloperName, "Non_compliance_Lodgement_Issue") && ((ISPICKVAL(Status,'Resolution Plan') && ISBLANK(Resolution_Plan_Date__c)) || (ISBLANK(TEXT(Resolution__c)) && ISPICKVAL(Status,"Closed"))))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If Status is Resolution Plan please fill out Resolution Plan Date, Resolution cannot be blank if case Status is closed.
